speech.0: It gives me pleasure at the outset to congratulate you, Madam President, on your election to the presidency of the General Assembly at its sixty-first session. I wish you every success in your endeavours. I should also like to thank your predecessor, Mr. Jan Eliasson, for his efforts during the Assemblys sixtieth session. Our thanks also go to Mr. Kofi Annan, who has been working to strengthen the role of the United Nations. the international community reaffirmed its commitment to the global partnership for development in order to achieve internationally agreed development objectives.
